EmailTemplate.subject: Lexus Financial Services - Contact Us Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName}:
Thank you for contacting Lexus Financial Services via the 'Contact Us' link at www.LexusFinancial.com.
Messages sent through this email channel are unsecure. Because, we value your privacy, we will not provide account-specific or password related information through this unsecured email channel.
If your question is account-specific or password related please follow the instructions below to submit a Support Request in our secure Support Center in order for us to assist you.
If your question is not account specific, we will respond with an email within 2 business days.
SEND A SECURE MESSAGE
Please follow these instructions to send us a secure message:
- Login to www.LexusFinancial.com with your username and password. If you do not have a log in, please click register and follow the prompts - Select Support Center Inbox link on the left side of the web page - Select 'NEW Support Request' button to send a message
CONTACT US BY PHONE
To speak with a Customer Service Representative, please call toll free (800)874-7050. The hours of operation are 8am to 8pm Monday-Friday.
Thank you for visiting us at www.LexusFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Lexus Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
